title: Splendor
notes: Worked Great. Sound was a little choppy. Turned off Music in game. Played a few matches online with no issues.

Game works perfectly, except background music crackles a little bit (sound is fine otherwise). This music issue **probably** can be worked around through Pulseaudio settings, but it can be turned off or ignored as well (this is card game after all).

notes: Everything works fine. Only sound is a little bit weird, but is not necessary in this game
